metrics.name: Auto Discovery
metrics.description: Ability to automatically discover new templates and integrate them into the system

thresholds.T0: Advanced auto-discovery with real-time detection of new templates; seamless integration without system restart; intelligent categorization of discovered templates; automatic validation against schema; notification system for new templates; version control for template updates
thresholds.T1: Basic auto-discovery mechanism; periodic scanning for new templates; standard integration requiring restart; manual categorization with some assistance; simple validation checks

metrics.name: Refresh Detection
metrics.description: Ability to detect changes during application runtime and update templates accordingly

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated change detection with millisecond response time; differential update mechanism; automatic conflict resolution; graceful state management during updates; backward compatibility handling; multi-user synchronization; audit logging of all template changes
thresholds.T1: Standard change detection with reasonable response time; basic update mechanism; manual conflict resolution; stable state management; single-user focus; simple change logging
